title: Strategies for Improving Mathematics Education Satisfaction Using MOOCs-Based Mixed Research Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Job-integrated math education for professionals, combining offline classes with MOOCs materials via personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Learners can analyze satisfaction factors in MOOCs-based mathematics education using mixed research methods (quantitative + qualitative)
Learners can derive strategies for improving educational effectiveness by synthesizing survey and interview data
Learners can design interaction strategies for mathematics MOOCs based on feedback results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
